content.text:
# Howard Slusher

Howard Slusher (June 11, 1937 – July 13, 2022) was an American attorney and sports agent. He was known for his aggressive and relentless negotiation style.
List of Howard Slusher clients
Basketball
* Mike Bratz
* Tom Chambers
* Danny Vranes
* Paul Westphal
* Gus Williams

* Carl Barzilauskas
